description: Try our easy to follow Fish Burgers With Pickled Cucumber & Jalapeño Mayo recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Pescatarian,Fish,Quick & easy dinner,Christmas,Quick & easy lunch,Fish burger
name: Fish Burgers With Pickled Cucumber & Jalapeño Mayo Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 firm white skinless fish fillets (120g each)
1 Lebanese cucumber, thinly sliced into ribbons

recipeInstructions.text: Place flour, egg and breadcrumbs in separate shallow bowls. Dip each fish fillet in flour to lightly coat, then in egg, then in breadcrumbs, pressing on firmly. Place fillets on a plate and set aside.
To make the pickled cucumber, combine Lebanese cucumber, apple cider vinegar and sugar in a ceramic bowl. Cover and set aside.
To make the jalapeño mayo, combine mayonnaise, dill, red onion and jalapeño in a small bowl. Cover and chill.
Heat oil in a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Add fillets and cook for 3 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
Spread roll bases with jalapeño mayo and top with lettuce, fish and drained cucumber. Season with pepper, top with roll tops and serve.
